Description: Masters of blade and spiritual resonance.
Stealth assassins who manipulate lightness arts.
Masters of the five elemental phases.
Monks who refine the body into a vessel of Qi.
Warriors of long reach and precision.
Manipulate Qi through sound and vibration.
Masters of alchemy and explosive mixtures.
Summoners who bond with spirit beasts.
Experts of spiritual arrays and sigil formations.
